question:
Consider the following authorities:
  1. Union Finance Minister
  2. Revenue Secretary 
  3. Chairperson of Central Board of Excise and Customs
Which of the above has/have voting rights in the GST Council?
explanation: Chairperson of Central Board of Excise and Customs will be a permanent invitee to the Council with non-voting rights. Revenue Secretary will be the ex-officio Secretary to the GST Council.
